TopicTitle: Looking for mod that adds hull-attachable ablative/heatshield parts

Articles.Content:
Hi guys

Long time ago, I had tons of mods and one of them had this type of heatshield part that you could attact to any area. Unlike the typical Capt America shield or another mod's Ablative Airbrakes, this one had these small parts you could attach anywhere. 

Does anybody remember the name of this mod?

 

Thanks
